alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Oneida County through 945 PM EDT... At 931 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alder Creek, or 10 miles southeast of Boonville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alder Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
